title: There is no option to play ranked
body: I dont know if something has changed with rank but i was able to play it yesturday but this morning there isnt even an option for ranked

replies.body:
By "ranked" do you mean all ranked queues or just ranked solo queue? 

There is always a ranked queue on OCE at any time of day, but it's not always ranked solo. From 4 am - 7 am AEST only ranked flex is available.
Oh i didnt realise that. Thank you
